description: Rear roof extension; insertion of dormer windows to roof slope, front x 1 and side x 1; raising the roof ridgeline; insertion of windows to first floor side elevation, second floor front gable x 2 and rear elevation; installation of photovoltaic panels to side roof slope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):  Existing OS Plan 22-011-E01, Existing Site Plan 22-011-E02, Existing GF Plan 22-011-E03, Existing FF Plan 22-011-E04, Existing SF Plan 22-011-E05, Existing Roof Plan 22-011-E06, Existing Front Elevation 22-011-E07, Existing Rear Elevation 22-011-E08, Existing Side Elevation 22-011-E09, Existing Side Elevation 22-011-E10, Existing Context Elevations 22-011-E11

Proposed OS Plan 22-011-P01, Proposed Site Plan 22-011-P02, Proposed GF Plan 22-011-P03, Proposed FF Plan 22-011-P04, Proposed Loft Floor Plan 22-011-P05, Proposed Roof Plan 22-011-P06, Proposed Front Elevation 22-011-P07, Proposed Rear Elevation 22-011-P08, Proposed Side Elevation 22-011-P09, Proposed Side Elevation 22-011-P10, Proposed Context Elevations 22-011-P11
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Any solar PV or solar thermal equipment installed on the roof of the subject dwellinghouse must adhere to the of provisions, limitation and conditions of Schedule 2, Part 14, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy SI 2, 3 of the London Plan (2021).
| The proposed 1x first floor window on the southern elevation shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
